channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gisèle Pelicot's ex-husband found guilty in mass rape trial in France
item.description: A French judge has sentenced Gisèle Pelicot's ex-husband to 20 years in prison for drugging and raping her for years and inviting dozens of other men ...

item.title: Biden pledges to cut US greenhouse gases by more than 60% as he exits world stage
Warren Buffett Owns 1 Vanguard Index Fund That Could Soar 147%, According to a Top Wall Street Analyst
Man accused in UnitedHealthcare CEO killing expected to appear at hearing on extradition to New York
Trump backs House GOP accusation Liz Cheney tampered with Jan. 6 committee witness
item.description: She called the allegation "a malicious and cowardly assault on the truth."

item.title: 12/18: CBS Evening News
item.description: Last-minute government funding bill in limbo after opposition from Trump, others; Lawmakers target AI-generated “deepfake pornography”

item.title: Morning Bid: Markets fear Fed floor at 4%, dollar booms
Putin says Russia is ready for a missile duel with the U.S
UPMC Hamot saw higher-than-expected mortality rates in seven categories, per report
Lee leads 33 governors in urging Biden to push China to end foreign adoption ban
Southwestern Democrats throw support behind Ken Martin for DNC chair
item.description: Four state party chairs are backing Minnesota's Ken Martin in his bid to chair the Democratic National Committee (DNC), ABC News has learned.

item.title: WATCH: Multiple storms barrel across US as holiday travel ramps up
item.description: Back-to-back storms are heading to the Northeast, with one storm stretching from the mid-South to Maine, ahead of a record number of flights in the ai...

item.title: Oklahoma set to execute man who killed girl, 10, during cannibalistic fantasy
item.description: Oklahoma is preparing to execute Kevin Underwood, who killed a 10-year-old girl ​during a cannibalistic fantasy. It would be the 25th and last schedul...

item.title: Teamsters begin 'largest strike' against Amazon
item.description: The Teamsters said the strike will begin Thursday at several facilities, including in New York City, Atlanta, California and Illinois.

item.title: 2 soldiers killed by landmine day after troops killed by booby trap
item.description: The incident happened one day after a blast caused by another improvised landmine killed two Mexican soldiers and wounded five others.

item.title: Drone updates: FAA temporarily bans drone operations in several parts of New Jersey
item.description: The government may use "deadly force" against the drones if they pose an "imminent security threat," the FAA said in a Notice to Airmen.

item.title: Wisconsin school shooter had 2 guns and got messages from man accused of plotting his own attack
item.description: Police say the shooter who killed a student and teacher at a religious school in Wisconsin this week brought two guns to the school.

item.title: Biden sets new climate goal for slashing U.S. greenhouse gas emissions
item.description: The new goal is part of the Paris Agreement​, under which member nations must update their emission cut targets every five years.
